title: Capillary Hemangioma in Maxillary Anterior Region: A Case Report
patient: A male patient aged 10 years reported with a painless swelling in upper left anterior region from past 3 months. Soft tissue overgrowth was seen in relation to 22 and 63 involving attached gingiva (). History revealed excision of the lesion 3 months back in the same region. After 1 month of excision, the lesion reoccurred. Patient does not give any history of pain in that region.
